wargame.engine

Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.engine.Engine

  • public class Engine
extends java.lang.Object
    The engine handle the actions done by the player to make it's characters to attack, move etc. It updates the map widget and the side panel to make them display each action.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
